* Triangular SImulation
ka1 10**7 ka2 2*10**-6 kd1=kd2=5*10**-4

[([5e-11, 5.000000000000505e-11], 'Kd_Mono_Sim'), ([5e-11, 250.0, 5.000000000000505e-11], 'Kd_total_sim', 2e-10), ([5e-11, 250.0, 2.7499550017720478e-11], 'Kd_total_sim', 2e-10)]
The Biv apparent binding is 4*10**-12


With sort of everything
